positive.explanation: Consultants effectively demonstrate enrollment leadership through clear action steps, specific timelines, and confident ownership
positive.explanation1: Strong execution of practical assistance through immediate template provision, step-by-step guidance, and proactive problem-solving
positive.explanation2: Effective presentation of strategic solutions when addressing enrollment barriers, maintaining momentum through clear options

improvement.explanation: Greater emphasis needed on obtaining explicit verbal agreements and converting interest into immediate enrollment actions
improvement.explanation1: Stronger control required in establishing specific intake dates and maintaining momentum through clear enrollment deadlines
improvement.explanation2: More authoritative and comprehensive explanation required of payment options and HECS arrangements

conversations.title: Strong Process Control in Enrollment Steps
conversations.consultant_close_attempt: It'll have the steps on how to retrieve what's called your USI transcript... it only takes us 10 minutes to finalize your application over the phone
conversations.student_response: Okay, so the process is for you, but, so I need to, okay, so how do I go about starting it?
conversations.consultant_adaptation: So we just need a copy of your resume, so I'll send you an email now. I'll CC in Bridget and I'll include a resume template for you
conversations.recommended_improvement: Schedule specific follow-up appointment during initial conversation and confirm immediate next steps with exact times and dates

goal_setting.title: Strong Process Control in Enrollment Steps
goal_setting.consultant_close_attempt: The consultant provided basic information without taking control of the enrollment process
goal_setting.student_response: The student showed interest but received no clear guidance on next steps
goal_setting.consultant_adaptation: No clear follow-up plan was established to maintain enrollment momentum
goal_setting.recommended_improvement: Should have proposed immediate enrollment steps and secured specific commitments for document submission and follow-up calls
